thread.title: Rebel Wilson To Host REBEL FOR TORRID Fashion Collection Launch Party "Welcome To The Rebelution"
thread.title_full: Rebel Wilson To Host REBEL FOR TORRID Fashion Collection Launch Party "Welcome To The Rebelution" - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Rebel Wilson To Host REBEL FOR TORRID Fashion Collection Launch Party "Welcome To The Rebelution"
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE TORRID
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Actress, writer and comedian, Rebel Wilson, will host a launch party for her fashion collaboration with TORRID, the country's fastest growing plus size brand. The REBEL FOR TORRID capsule collection will be unveiled at MILK in Hollywood on October 22, 2015 .
Rebel, who is best known for her roles in films such as Bridesmaids and Pitch Perfect 1 & 2 , and who will appear in the upcoming film How To Be Single in theaters February 12, 2016 , is a fan of Torrid's sexy, edgy fashion making the collaboration a perfect fit.
"I'm a creative person. I create characters, scripts, jokes, music… so I thought, why not clothes?" explains Rebel. "I've been wearing Torrid's clothing for years, and so it just seemed like a natural fit to collaborate with them."
The limited-edition collection has Rebel's personal touch all over it. Several pieces feature her script 'Rebel' signature. A koala motif nods to her Australian background. Even small details, like microphone-shaped hardware and charms, are inspired by her early career in stand-up comedy. The look is distinctively Rebel -- casual street style mixed with a few red-carpet-ready pieces.
Friends of Rebel, Torrid representatives and select members of the press will gather for an intimate event at MILK Thursday night, October 22, 2015 . The brand will toast this exciting partnership and unveil a first look at the collection with a pop-up shop that brings REBEL FOR TORRID to life.
Lisa Harper , Torrid CEO states, "Working with Rebel was so much fun. We're thrilled with the results. This is the preview event to celebrate the collection. Our customers love Rebel -- we can't wait to show it to them."
REBEL FOR TORRID will be sold exclusively in Torrid stores in the U.S. and Canada , and online at Torrid.com starting the first week of November 2015 . The limited-edition collection features approximately 25 pieces including tops, bottoms, jackets and dresses, plus accessories, ranging in price from $22 .50–$98.50. A spring 2016 collection is in the works as well.
The launch is eagerly anticipated by fans of Rebel and Torrid worldwide.
#RebelForTorrid
ABOUT TORRID
Torrid designs and retails fashion apparel, accessories, swimwear and lingerie for young, stylish women who wear sizes 12 to 28. Its exclusive collections inspire them to feel sexy, confident and downright irresistible. Torrid has over 330 stores across the U.S. and Canada , and online at Torrid.com . Find Torrid on Facebook ( Facebook.com/Torrid ), Instagram (@Torridfashion), Pinterest ( Pinterest.com/Torridfashion ), Twitter (@Torridfashion) and YouTube ( YouTube.com/Torridfashion ).
#TorridInsider
